title: Effect of crowding out on real output and PL

content.question: If government spending increases and crowds out an equal amount of private investment in physical capital, then the increase in government spending will

choices.label: increase real output and the price level
increase real output and leave the price level unchanged
leave real output and the price level unchanged
leave real output unchanged and increase the price level

content.answer: leave real output and the price level unchanged

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
